Authors:
Arnaud Faille, Achille Casale, Michael Balke, Ignacio
Ribera
Title:
A molecular Phylogeny of Alpine subterranean Trechini
(Coleoptera:Carabidae)
Keywords:
Subterranean Evolution, Alps, troglomorphism, ground
beetles, palearctic speciation, cave
Abstract:
Background: The Alpine region harbours one of the most
diverse subterranean faunas in the world, with many species showing
extreme morphological modifications. The ground beetles of tribe
Trechini (Coleoptera, Carabidae) are among the best studied and
widespread groups with abundance of troglobionts, but their origin and
evolution is largely unknown.
